product.product_title: On Men's The Roger Advantage Shoes
product.cushioning: Removable molded insole for a personalized cushioning feel.
product.breathability: Perforations on the upper provide some ventilation.
product.short_description: Elevate your everyday style with the On Men's The Roger Advantage Shoes, a sophisticated lifestyle sneaker that represents the pinnacle of the collaboration between On and Roger Federer. Designed for the man who appreciates timeless elegance and modern comfort, this shoe takes the classic tennis silhouette and reimagines it with Swiss-engineered precision. The upper is constructed from supple, high-quality leather, offering a premium look and feel that only gets better with age. Its clean lines and minimalist design make it an incredibly versatile piece, suitable for smart-casual occasions and relaxed weekends alike. The true innovation lies underfoot, where On's signature CloudTec? pods are discreetly integrated into the outsole. This technology provides a level of cushioning and flexibility that is a revelation compared to traditional flat-soled sneakers, turning every walk into a soft, comfortable experience. A hidden Speedboard? works in harmony with the pods to promote a natural, rolling stride. Finished with subtle co-branding details, The Roger Advantage shoes are more than just footwear; they are a testament to the fusion of heritage and innovation, offering unparalleled comfort for the discerning individual.
